title.rendered: VANDEBRON EMPLOYEES RECEIVE TREE AS A GIFT

content.rendered:
Last Christmas 250 Vandebron employees became a bit more sustainable; they got a Corekees tree from Santa! 🎅🌳

Vandebron employees can:
• Reinvest in new trees, reducing their CO2 footprint, or;
• They can benefit themselves from their “return on investment”.

Let it grow, let it grow, let it grow! 🎄
